JUDGES: Mark Villiger;Mirjana Lazarova Trajkovska;Mykhaylo Buromenskiy;Peer Lorenzen;Rait Maruste;Renate Jaeger;Zdravka Kalaydjieva
TEXT: CARDINAL . The applicant was born in DATE and lives in the city of GPE , GPE .
CARDINAL . On CARDINAL DATE the applicant was dismissed .

CARDINAL . On DATE the applicant instituted proceedings in the ORG of Odessa ( “ the ORG ” ) against her former employer , seeking recovery of salary arrears and other payments owed to her , and compensation for failure to observe the correct procedure for her dismissal .
CARDINAL . On DATE the proceedings in the case were suspended pending the outcome of another set of proceedings concerning the applicant 's reinstatement .
CARDINAL . The next hearing was scheduled for DATE .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG found against the applicant .
CARDINAL . On DATE the same court declared her appeal inadmissible owing to its procedural shortcomings .
CARDINAL . On DATE the NORP Regional Court of Appeal ( “ the ORG of Appeal ” ) quashed that ruling and declared the appeal admissible .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed the judgment of DATE and referred the case back for fresh consideration . On the same date the court adopted a separate ruling , drawing the attention of the President of ORG to the length of the proceedings in question .
CARDINAL . On DATE ORG again found against the applicant .

CARDINAL . On DATE ORG quashed that judgment and rendered a new one , finding in part for the applicant . It awarded the applicant CARDINAL NORP hryvnias ( ORG , CARDINAL ) in salary arrears and other payments and ORG CARDINAL,CARDINAL ( QUANTITY ) in compensation for non - pecuniary damage . On DATE the court adopted another separate ruling , drawing the attention of the President of ORG to the length of the proceedings in question .
CARDINAL . The applicant appealed in cassation against the judgment of DATE . On DATE ORG , sitting as a cassation court , upheld that judgment .
